errorDetails.message: There are active or disabled subscriptions assigned to the invoice section. Either move the subscription to another invoice section or delete the subscriptions and then try deleting the invoice section.
This is the only invoice section in this billing profile so it can’t be deleted.
This is the invoice section that was created when its billing profile was created so it can’t be deleted.
There are active products with recurring charges assigned to the invoice section. Either move the products to a different invoice section or wait till the end of the billing period for the products.
The invoice section has the RI asset with a billing plan.
